Masukkan Kartu Debit BCA & PIN kartu Anda.
Pilih menu Transfer > ke Rekening BCA.
Masukkan nominal transfer.
Masukkan nomor rekening tujuan.
Ikuti instruksi untuk menyelesaikan transaksi.
Isi slip setoran.
Lakukan transaksi di teller.
Buka dan login ke myBCA.
Pilih menu Transfer > Rekening BCA > Transfer ke Tujuan Baru.
Masukkan nomor rekening tujuan.
Pilih rekening sumber dana dan masukkan nominal transfer.
Pastikan nomor rekening dan nominal sudah sesuai.
Masukkan PIN transaksi.
Buka dan login ke myBCA.
Pilih Fitur Cardless > Setor Tunai.
Pilih setor ke rekening pribadi, masukkan PIN myBCA, dapatkan 6 digit Kode Transaksi.
Pada ATM Setor Tarik BCA, klik menu Transaksi Tanpa Kartu.
Masukkan nomor handphone terdaftar dan Kode Transaksi.
Setorkan uang di ATM Setor Tarik dan pastikan jumlah yang tertera sesuai.
Datang ke mesin ATM berlogo PRIMA.
Masukkan Kartu Debit BCA & PIN kartu Anda.
Pilih menu Transfer > Transfer ke Rek Bank Lain.
Masukkan kode bank BCA (014).
Masukkan nomor rekening tujuan.
Masukkan nominal.
Pastikan nomor rekening dan nominal sudah sesuai.
Masukkan PIN Kartu Anda.
Login mobile/internet banking.
Pilih menu Transfer > Transfer ke Rek Bank Lain.
Pilih Bank BCA atau masukkan kode bank BCA (014).
Masukkan nomor rekening tujuan.
Masukkan nominal.
Ikuti instruksi untuk menyelesaikan transaksi.

Make sure that your e-KTP is genuine and not a scanned, uploaded, or photocopied version
Make sure that your e-KTP is not cropped, data and photo clearly visible.
Pastikan NPWP harus asli dan bukan versi scan, unggah atau fotokopi.
Pastikan NPWP tidak terpotong, data dan foto terlihat jelas, tidak buram.
Tanda tangan dengan tinta hitam di atas kertas putih polos.
Pastikan tanda tangan terlihat jelas, tidak buram, tidak terpotong, dan sama dengan yang tercantum pada KTP-el.

Make an initial deposit using a Tahapan, Tahapan Gold, Tahapan Xpresi, or Tapres Account.

You can access the complete transaction data in the e-statement. The BCA Tahapan Passbook or Tapres Account Statement can still be used to view IDR transactions on the account linked to the Forex Pocket.
Ensure the Forex Pocket balance is sufficient for a successful transaction. Transactions in currencies outside the Forex Pocket will be converted into IDR.
The source of fund account on the initial deposit will be linked to the Forex Pocket
Forex Pocket transaction history can be viewed on myBCA
Overseas Debit Mastercard transactions will debit the Forex Pocket according to the currency of the transaction
One Account Can Have Multiple Foreign Currencies
After activating once, conduct forex transactions at an attractive rate at any time.

Wear proper clothes, and make sure your face not covered with anything, such as mask and glasses.

Turn your face in front of the camera.
Position your face until it fits within the frame.
*) Total Proceeds stated does not include transaction fee.
The purchase of Secondary Market Bonds & SBN will increase your portfolio and will be reflected in the Account Transaction List once the settlement is successful (estimated 2–3 business days).
*) Total Proceeds stated does not include transaction fee.
The purchase of Secondary Market Bonds & SBN will increase your portfolio and will be reflected in the Account Transaction List once the settlement is successful (estimated 2–3 business days).
Promo benefits will only be given if you have met the terms and conditions.
*) Total Proceeds stated does not include transaction fee.
Promo benefits will only be given if you have met the terms and conditions.
*) Total Proceeds stated does not include transaction fee.
The sale of Secondary Market Bonds & SBN will reduce your portfolio and will be reflected in the Account Transaction List once the settlement is successful (estimated 2–3 business days).
Total Proceeds stated DOES NOT INCLUDE Transaction Fee and the Total Proceeds may change while transaction is in progress.
Secondary Market Bonds & SBN transactions conducted during transaction service hours (until 15.00 WIB or other specified time) will be processed on the same bourse day.
Secondary Market Bonds & SBN transactions conducted after transaction service hours or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) cannot be processed.
The specified time refers to Western Indonesia Time (WIB).
Total Proceeds stated DOES NOT INCLUDE Transaction Fee and the Total Proceeds may change while transaction is in progress.
Secondary Market Bonds & SBN transactions conducted during transaction service hours (until 15.00 WIB or other specified time) will be processed on the same bourse day.
Secondary Market Bonds & SBN transactions conducted after transaction service hours or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) cannot be processed.
The specified time refers to Western Indonesia Time (WIB).
Promo benefits will only be given if you have met the terms and conditions.
To find out whether your SBN payment transaction was successful, please regularly check the Activity menu.
Promo benefits will only be given if you have met the terms and conditions.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted until 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on the bourse day will be processed on the same bourse day, using the Net Asset Value (NAV)/Participation Unit of the same bourse day.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted after 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on a bourse day or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) will be processed on the next bourse day, using the NAV/Participation Unit of the next bourse day.
The specified time refers to Western Indonesia Time (WIB).
The confirmation of a Mutual Fund investment issued by the Custodian Bank is a valid proof of ownership.
Your Mutual Fund redemption transaction is being processed. The number of Mutual Fund Units in your portfolio will be updated once the process is complete (estimated 1 – 2 bourse days).
The confirmation of a Mutual Fund investment issued by the Custodian Bank is a valid proof of ownership.
Your Mutual Fund subscription transaction is being processed. Mutual Fund Units will be added to your portfolio once the process is complete (estimated 1 – 2 bourse days).
Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account on the auto-subscription date you selected.
Please check the Mutual Fund List of Transactions in My Account on each auto-subscription date.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted until 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on the bourse day will be processed on the same bourse day, using the Net Asset Value (NAV)/Participation Unit of the same bourse day.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted after 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on a bourse day or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) will be processed on the next bourse day, using the NAV/Participation Unit of the next bourse day.
The specified time refers to Western Indonesia Time (WIB).
The confirmation of a Mutual Fund investment issued by the Custodian Bank is a valid proof of ownership.
Your Mutual Fund switching transaction is being processed. The number of Mutual Fund Units in your portfolio will be updated once the process is complete (estimated 1 – 2 bourse days).
"The Redemption Amount and redemption fee is still an estimation. The final amount will be based on the NAV/Unit on the day of redemption."

Mutual Fund transactions conducted until 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on the bourse day will be processed on the same bourse day, using the Net Asset Value (NAV)/Participation Unit of the same bourse day.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted after 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on a bourse day or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) will be processed on the next bourse day, using the NAV/Participation Unit of the next bourse day.
The redemption amount and redemption fee that you will transact is still an estimation. The final amount will be based on the NAV/Unit on the day of redemption.

The confirmation of a Mutual Fund investment issued by the Custodian Bank is a valid proof of ownership.
Your Mutual Fund subscription is being processed. Mutual Fund Units will be added to your portfolio once the process is complete (estimated 1 – 2 bourse days).
Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account on the auto-subscription date you selected.
Please check the Mutual Fund List of Transactions in My Account on each auto-subscription date.

Product auto-subscription amount does not include the subscription fee for each Mutual Fund product. Auto-subscription amount will be allocated to respective asset class based on the analysis results according to the selected strategy.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted until 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on the bourse day will be processed on the same bourse day, using the Net Asset Value (NAV)/Participation Unit of the same bourse day.

Mutual Fund transactions conducted after 13.00 Western Indonesia Time (WIB) on a bourse day or on a bourse holiday (including Saturday, Sunday, and a national holiday) will be processed on the next bourse day, using the NAV/Participation Unit of the next bourse day.
The specified time refers to Western Indonesia Time (WIB).

The request for auto-subscription must be made no later than T-1 bourse day of the intended auto-subscription date. To change/terminate the auto-subscription transactions can be done through the Edit Goal menu.

Product auto-subscription amount does not include the subscription fee for each Mutual Fund product. Auto-subscription amount will be allocated to respective asset class based on the analysis results according to the selected strategy.
Product auto-subscription amount does not include the subscription fee for each Mutual Fund product. Auto-subscription amount will be allocated to respective selected product(s).
The confirmation of a Mutual Fund investment issued by the Custodian Bank is a valid proof of ownership.
Your Mutual Fund subscription is being processed. Mutual Fund Units will be added to your portfolio once the process is complete (estimated 1 – 2 bourse days).
Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account on the auto-subscription date you selected.
Please check the Mutual Fund List of Transactions in My Account on each auto-subscription date.
QRIS will be shown for payments.
Make sure the transaction amount is correct. Payments with QRIS will be debited directly from your account.

Make sure the Bluetooth on both your phone and Wear OS smartwatch are active.
Make sure the myBCA app is installed on your Wear OS smartwatch.
Open the myBCA app on your Wear OS smartwatch, then click Connect.
Make sure myBCA app on your phone and Wear OS smartwatch stays open throughout the connection process.
Start connecting by clicking Connect Now button at the bottom of this screen.
